COMING_SOON.TITLE: Coming soon
COMING_SOON.GO_TO_CLASSIC_REPORTMANAGER_LINK: Switch to classic Report Manager in the meantime.

GLOBAL_ERRORS.TIMEOUT: Could not connect to the server. Please check your network settings and try again later.
GLOBAL_ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED: You do not have permission for this operation. Contact your administrator to obtain the necessary permissions.
GLOBAL_ERRORS.UNSPECIFIED: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
GLOBAL_ERRORS.SERVICE_LOGIN: The report server isn’t configured properly. Contact your system administrator to resolve the issue. System administrators: The report server can’t connect to its database because it doesn’t have permission to do so. Use Reporting Services Configuration Manager to update the report server database credentials.
GLOBAL_ERRORS.SERVICE_AVAIL: Contact your system administrator to resolve the issue. System administrators: The report server can’t connect to its database. Make sure the database is running and accessible. You can also check the report server trace log for details.
GLOBAL_ERRORS.SERVICE_CONFIG: The report server isn’t configured properly. Contact your system administrator to resolve the issue. System administrators: Check the report server trace log for details.
GLOBAL_ERRORS.ENCRYPTION_CONFIG: The report server isn’t configured properly. Contact your system administrator to resolve the issue. System administrators: The report server can’t access or use the encryption key. You might need to add the server to the scale-out group, reimport encrypted content, or delete all encrypted content and generate a new encryption key.
GLOBAL_ERRORS.UPLOAD_LARGER_THAN_SERVER_LIMIT: This file is too large to be uploaded. The maximum file size is currently set to {{Size}} MB.
GLOBAL_ERRORS.UPLOAD_LARGER_THAN_PORTAL_LIMIT: This file is too large to be uploaded. Files larger than {{Size}} MB are not currently supported.
GLOBAL_ERRORS.PORTAL_URL_CONFIG: The report server isn’t configured properly. Contact your system administrator to resolve the issue. System administrators: The report server Web Portal URLs and Web Service URLs don’t match. Use Reporting Services Configuration Manager to configure the URLs and ensure they match.

CATALOG_ERRORS.FOLDER_NOT_FOUND: The folder “{{name}}” does not exist. It could have been renamed, moved, or deleted.
CATALOG_ERRORS.KPI_NOT_FOUND: The KPI “{{name}}” does not exist. It could have been renamed, moved, or deleted.
CATALOG_ERRORS.ITEM_NOT_FOUND: The item “{{name}}” does not exist. It could have been renamed, moved, or deleted.
CATALOG_ERRORS.DRILLTHROUGH_REPORT_NOT_FOUND: The drillthrough report does not exist.
CATALOG_ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED_VIEW_FOLDER: You are not allowed to view this folder. Contact your administrator to obtain the necessary permissions.
CATALOG_ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED_VIEW_PROPERTIES: You are not allowed to view the properties of this item. Contact your administrator to obtain the necessary permissions.
CATALOG_ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED_REPLACEITEM: You are not allowed to replace the selected item. Contact your administrator to obtain the necessary permissions.
CATALOG_ERRORS.INVALID_ITEM_NAME: The name “{{name}}” is not valid. Names must not contain any of the following characters: {{restrictedCharacters}}. Names must not contain URL-encoded characters. Names must be less than {{maxNameLength}} characters.
CATALOG_ERRORS.LONG_PATH: The name of the item is too long. The combined length of the item name and its parent folders must be less than {{maxNameLength}} characters. Use a shorter name or move the item to one of its parent folders.
CATALOG_ERRORS.FOLDER_ALREADY_EXISTS: Another folder already exists with the same name. Please enter a different name.
CATALOG_ERRORS.ITEM_ALREADY_EXISTS: Another item already exists with the same name. Please enter a different name.
CATALOG_ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED_MOVEITEM: You are not allowed to move or rename selected item. Contact your administrator to obtain the necessary permissions.
CATALOG_ERRORS.INVALID_REPORT_DEFINITION_SSRS: The definition of this report is not valid or supported by this version of Reporting Services.
CATALOG_ERRORS.INVALID_REPORT_DEFINITION_PBIRS: The definition of this report is not valid or supported by this version of Power BI Report Server.
CATALOG_ERRORS.INVALID_RESOURCE_EXTENSION: Uploading or saving files with this extension is not allowed. Contact your administrator if you have any questions.
CATALOG_ERRORS.INVALID_RESOURCE_MIMETYPE: Uploading or saving files with this mime type is not allowed. Contact your administrator if you have any questions.
CATALOG_ERRORS.INVALID_EXCEL_EXTENSION: Changing Excel file extension is not allowed.

PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_URL: Publish to Power BI environment URL
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_INFO: Publish these reports online to Power BI service.
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_INFO_URL: What type of reports are supported?
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_ONBOARDING_PARAGRAPH: Now you can publish multiple reports to the Power BI service with just a few clicks.
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_LABEL: Select reports to publish to Power BI
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_ERROR_LIMIT_MESSAGE: Your Report Server admin has set a limit of {{migrateLimit}} reports for migrate to Power BI. Please select fewer reports and try again.
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_ERROR_ITEMS_NOT_SELECTED: You don't have reports suitable for migration.
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED: You are not allowed to publish reports from this folder. Contact your administrator to obtain the necessary permissions.
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_ERROR_DISABLED_ON_SERVER: The administrator of your report server has disabled the option to publish reports.
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: You don't have permissions to publish {{count}} report(s). See details for list of reports with restricted access.
PUBLISH_TO_PBI.PUBLISH_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS_A: You can't publish any report of your selection as you don't have sufficient permissions.

ITEMS.NO_ITEMS_IN_FOLDER: There are no items in this folder.
ITEMS.NO_RELEVANT_ITEMS_IN_FOLDER: There are no items to show.
ITEMS.NO_ITEMS_IN_FAVORITES: Star your favorite items from the Browse page to show them here.
ITEMS.NO_RELEVANT_ITEMS_IN_FAVORITES: No relevant items have been added to Favorites.
ITEMS.SAME_SOURCE_DEST_PATH: You are trying to move this item to the same folder.

SEARCH.FORBIDDEN_QUERY: Search query cannot be empty, consist only of whitespaces or contain any of the following characters: " + < > |
SEARCH.NO_RESULTS: No results match your search criteria. Please refine your search.
SEARCH.NO_RELEVANT_RESULTS: No relevant results match your search criteria.
SEARCH.RESULTS_MESSAGE: Search results for name and description including:

SECURITY.USE_FOR_RESOURCE_EDIT: Use this page to determine which tasks {{User}} can perform on {{Resource}}. You can assign {{User}} to more than one role if you want to expand the task list.
SECURITY.USE_FOR_RESOURCE_NEW: Use this page to assign role-based security for {{Resource}}.
SECURITY.USE_FOR_RLS_EDIT: Select one or more roles to assign to {{User}} on {{Resource}}.
SECURITY.USE_FOR_RLS_NEW: Use this page to add members to one or more roles for {{Resource}}.
SECURITY.USE_FOR_SYSTEM_NEW: Use this page to assign a user or group to a system role. You can also use this page to create or modify a system role definition.
SECURITY.USE_FOR_SYSTEM_EDIT: Use this page to change the roles that are assigned to {{User}}. This page contains system role definitions that apply to the report server as a whole.
SECURITY.ACTION: Select one or more roles to assign to the group or user.
SECURITY.CONFIRM_DELETE_POLICY: Are you sure you want to delete these items?
SECURITY.CONFIRM_DELETE_ROLE: Are you sure you want to delete this role assignment?
SECURITY.CONFIRM_OVERWRITE_PARENT_SECURITY: Item security is inherited from a parent item. Do you want to apply security settings for this item that are different from those of the {{Resource}} parent item?
SECURITY.CONFIRM_REVERT_TO_PARENT_SECURITY: The security settings that are defined for this item will be replaced by the security setting of its parent {{Resource}}. Do you want to continue?
SECURITY.ACTION_REVERT_TO_PARENT_SECURITY: Use same security as parent folder
SECURITY.DELETE_ALL_POLICIES: An item requires at least one role assignment. This error occurs when an attempt is made to delete all security for the current item.
SECURITY.RLS_NOT_AVAILABLE_AS_DQ: Row-level security is not available for reports using Direct Query with integrated authentication.

SUBSCRIPTIONS.NEED_RUN_UNATTENDED: Subscription can't be created or edited because the credentials used to run the report are not stored, or if a linked report, the link is no longer valid.
SUBSCRIPTIONS.EDIT_CHOOSE_DATADRIVEN_PROMPT: Generate and deliver one report for each row in a dataset
SUBSCRIPTIONS.EDIT_FIELD_PROCESSING_PROMPT: Deliver the report on the following schedule:
SUBSCRIPTIONS.EDIT_PARAMETER_VALUES: Specify the report parameter values to use with this subscription.
SUBSCRIPTIONS.EDIT_QUERY_HINT_CREATE: You need to create a dataset for this data-driven subscription.
SUBSCRIPTIONS.EDIT_QUERY_HINT_PASSWORD: A password is needed to connect the data source, click below to edit.
SUBSCRIPTIONS.EDIT_QUERY_HINT_DEFAULT: There's something wrong with your dataset, click below to edit.
SUBSCRIPTIONS.EDIT_READONLY_HINT: You can’t modify these options for this subscription.
SUBSCRIPTIONS.ALERT_USER_PROFILE_DEPENDENCY: Data-driven subscription cannot be created because the report or shared dataset has user profile dependencies and cannot be run unattended.

CACHING.OPTIONS_EXECUTION_LIVE: Always run this report with the most recent data
CACHING.OPTIONS_DATASET_EXECUTION_LIVE: Always run this dataset with the most recent data
CACHING.CHECKBOX_SNAPSHOT_SCHEDULE: Create cache snapshots on a schedule
CACHING.CHECKBOX_CREATE_SNAPSHOT_ON_SUBMIT: Create a cache snapshot when I click Apply on this page
CACHING.OPTIONS_DATASET_EXECUTION_CACHE: Cache copies of this dataset and use them when available
CACHING.OPTIONS_EXECUTION_CACHE: Cache copies of this report and use them when available
CACHING.OPTIONS_EXECUTION_SNAPSHOT: Always run this report against pregenerated snapshots
CACHING.OPTIONS_DATASET_EXECUTION_SNAPSHOT: Always run this dataset against pregenerated snapshots
CACHING.EDIT_SCHEDULE: Refresh the cache on the following schedule:
CACHING.ERROR_MISSING_CREDENTIALS: Cache refresh plans cannot be created or edited because the data source credentials used to run the associated item are not stored on the server.
CACHING.SAVE_TO_MANAGE_PLANS_HINT: You can manage cache refresh plans after you enable caching by clicking Apply on this page.
CACHING.DATA_REFRESH_NOT_AVAILABLE_AS_DQ: Scheduled Data Refresh is not available for reports using Direct Query or a Live Connection to SQL Server Analysis Services.
CACHING.DATA_REFRESH_NOT_READY: Stored credentials for this report are missing. Please go to the Data Sources page for this report and set your credentials for each data source to enable scheduled data refresh.
CACHING.DATA_REFRESH_NO_DATASOURCES: Scheduled Data Refresh is not available for reports. The report does not have any external data connections defined or is using an unsupported data source.
CACHING.DATA_REFRESH_REUPLOAD: This server was recently updated.  Please re-publish this report to the server to enable data source management and scheduled data refresh.

EDIT_KPIS.VALUE_TOOLTIP: Required. Numeric or text value to be shown on the KPI tile.
EDIT_KPIS.GOAL_TOOLTIP: Optional. Used as a comparison to a numeric value and shown as a percent difference.
EDIT_KPIS.STATUS_TOOLTIP: Optional. Numeric value used to determine the KPI status and color.
EDIT_KPIS.TRENDSET_ERROR: Required. Please enter semicolon-separated numeric values.
EDIT_KPIS.TRENDSET_TOOLTIP: Optional. Semicolon-separated numeric values used for chart visualizations.
